column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Simply awesome! I dined here on my trip home in April and could not be more happy with my experience. Started out with the old fashion and oysters
column2: which were both fantastic. There are also some decent craft beer options. For my meal I had the filet and it was cooked perfectly and tasted amazing! It was probably the best filet I have had
column4: and much better than Gibson's (which I feel has gone downhill a bit). I had the wild mushroom side
column6: both outstanding and again cooked perfectly. The atmosphere is great except it is dark
column8: which was the only thing I was not a fan of but darkness aside the place is a must! The service was outstanding as well
